accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the system.

completeness.description: The ability of the system to identify and integrate all necessary information to answer the question.

reasoning_traceability.description: How well the system's reasoning process can be followed and understood.

data_contamination_control.description: The system's success in avoiding the use of contaminated data from the internet.

response_time.description: The time taken by the system to provide a final answer from the initial query.

diversity_handling.description: The system's ability to handle a diverse set of subtasks within the overall challenge.

robustness.description: The system's ability to function correctly in the face of challenging or unexpected inputs.

scalability.description: The system's ability to maintain performance as the complexity or number of subtasks increases.

user_experience.description: The overall ease of interaction and satisfaction a user has with the system.

documentation_quality.description: The quality and clarity of documentation for the system's processes and capabilities.
